ITEM.name: Drafting Modeler Overview
ITEM.text: describes the foundations of the Drafting modeler.

ITEM.name: Creating a New Drawing Representation Reference
ITEM.text: is an example of creating a new Drawing Representation Reference.

ITEM.name: Creating Frames and Title Blocks
ITEM.text: is an example of creating geometry and annotations.

ITEM.name: Creating Center Lines
ITEM.text: is an example of creating annotations on interactive or generative geometry.

ITEM.name: Editing Dimension Dress-Up
ITEM.text: is an example of using dimension interfaces.

ITEM.name: Creating Annotations on View Components
ITEM.text: is an example of creating annotations on view components.

ITEM.name: Creating a Multi Sheet Interactive Command
ITEM.text: is an example of creating an interactive command working on several sheets.

ITEM.name: Creating a Distance Dimension on Interactive Geometry
ITEM.text: is an example of creating a distance dimension between two 2D lines.

ITEM.name: Creating a Dimension System on Interactive Geometry
ITEM.text: is an example of creating a dimension system on 2D geometry.

ITEM.name: Creating a Hatching Pattern on 2D Geometry
ITEM.text: is an example of using area fill interfaces.

ITEM.name: Creating a Generative View from 3D Data
ITEM.text: is an example to create Generative Views.

ITEM.name: Creating a Generative View from 3D FTA View
ITEM.text: is an example to create Generative Views from Functional Tolerancing & Annotation data.

ITEM.name: Editing Generative Views
ITEM.text: is an example to modify Generative Views.

ITEM.name: Editing Generative Shape
ITEM.text: is an example to modify a pattern in a Generative View.

ITEM.name: Editing Callouts in Generative Views
ITEM.text: is an example to modify callout in Generative Views.

ITEM.name: Editing Generated Geometry in Generative Views
ITEM.text: is an example to modify callout in Generative Views.

ITEM.name: Creating Generative View in Large Range context
ITEM.text: is an example of Drawing and View creation in Large Range context.
